ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Lizards are Cute!
ygData.msgSnippet: Heya! didint get my CD yet but i am getting really excited.  I m making a monk! ... On a sad note, had a BAD experience last night.  I was in a group in
ygData.messageBody:
Heya!


didint get my CD yet but i am getting really excited. I'm making a monk!
:) I'm going to amke a femalre though cuz i like the way they look.


On a sad note, had a BAD experience last night. I was in a group in
infected paw and my boyfreind was in another group in the same zone. One
of my group members kepot going near their "camp" and so Rob (my bf) asked
me to telkl him not to, which i did. he then said "who said that? I will
kill him hehehe" just joking and all, and i said "well it was my love who
said it so if you killed him i would ahve to kill you, and shoot a frosy
bolt up your ictchy arse" (as i am a wizard and heois a troll) then he
said "YOUR LOVE IS A MAN" and i said "yes i am gay, deal" and he procceded
to say "i ahve been grouped side by side witha fag!" and then disbanded
and shouted "I;m surrounded by freaks" needless to say he was repoirted,
but i dont tihnk a GM was on...maybe our little guide friend can look into
this....his name was Slamuk...no pressure, and i didint even suggest that
:) Luckily the other poeple in the group were great and thought he was
stupd and our replacement tank asked why our last one ran aorund screeming
and we told him and he was pissed and thought it was absurd...so that was
cool

have fun in kunark!

-joe

On Tue, 25 Apr 2000, Christina Norman wrote:

> Ok, this might just be a rant, but since it's non hostile I'm going to post it here =)
>
> WOW Iksar are so cute. The first time I ever saw one I was like...oh my gosh! It walks around and swings its little tail and talks and everything! It's like the best pet!
>
> And Kunark is very pretty. Lots of fun new zones, with cool looking critters. It's pretty obvious to me you could hunt in Kunark and never leave, and get all the way to 50. It seems a self sufficient continent.
>
> Kunark is dangerous though, I have talked to a lot of people who brought their mains over and got stomped by something.
>
> The solution to all this is...make an Iksar shaman! You get SOW at 9th level and you can explore like crazy. Team up with a friend and make an Iksar monk, and you have a great 2-person leveling/exploring team especially for low levels. FYI Iksar have regeneration, and the highest wis of the shaman races, making them the best shaman and monk races IMHO (though they aren't as cute as Duna).
>
> (Rumor: Iksar do not get the inherent haste that human monks get at level 20+)
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Your high school sweetheart-where is he now? With 4.4 million alumni
> already registered at Classmates.com, there's a good chance you'll
> find her here. Visit your online high school class reunion at:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/3139/4/_/560749/_/956676593/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
